basics.name: Joshua Lam
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a senior at the University of Hawaii pursuing a B.S. in computer engineering. I expect to graduate in May 2018. I am currently looking for software engineering opportunities in Hawaii or California.

work.summary: On the software development team in charge of android development
highlights: Designed and pitched a platform that can detect various wireless technologies
Worked with HTTP, Bluetooth, NFC, and RFID wireless protocols and technologies
Programmed in Java, Python, and SQL and used Android Studio

work.summary: Tutor for Math, Chemistry, and Physics & SI Leader for business calculus
highlights: Create and oversee a one-hour weekly review session for Business Calculus
Able to communicate difficult concepts to students of all learning styles

clubs.organization: Eta Kappa Nu - Delta Omega Chapter
clubs.summary: Honor Society for Electrical and Computer Engineers
highlights: Participate in engineering socials and events

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Gear Up Scholarship
awards.summary: Yearly scholarship awarded to Hawaii public school graduates who completed the Board of Education Recognition Diploma requirements and who demonstrate outstanding academic achievement.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earn a semester GPA of 3.5 on credits taken for a grade.
